channel.title: Letters on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Letters on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.14: Atlanta Florida Trip
item.description: 25th January 2015 Â Hi everyone, Recently Iâ€™ve been working on a few of my own projects apart from the environmental stuff so Iâ€™ve been putting this trip update off.

item.title: SVL 1.13: Starting the New Year
item.description: 15th January 2015 Â

item.title: SVL 1.11: The City of Angels and San Diego
item.description: 6th December 2014 Hi Everyone,

item.title: SVL 1.10: Alterbridge Weekend and East Coast
item.description: 11thÂ November 2014 Â

item.title: SVL 1.9: Palo Alto and Cousins
item.description: Two days after that I went to meet a member of TransForm â€“ an organisation that works on improving public transport http://www.transformca.org/landing-page/our-approachbecause one of the events I had previously attended was hosted by them and I had taken a short survey saying I wouldnâ€™t mind being contacted for more information/clarification of my ideas.

item.title: SVL 1.7: Mount Madonna, Davenport Beach, San Francisco, Yosemite
item.description: 4th September 2014 Â Hi, Here is the next update about our recent travels and experiences. Â This email is long (â€˜megalangâ€™) and itâ€™s taken me all day to upload and organise the pictures and write it out.

item.title: SVL 1.6: Two Months in the USA
SVL 1.5: A weekend in Michigan
item.description: <p> <img class="aligncenter" src="https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ui=2&ik=bc3f134ea3&view=att&th=147c738735f746ac&attid=0.3&disp=emb&realattid=ii_hyqcavj23_147c7125b21f0304&zw&atsh=1" alt="" width="342" height="456" /> </div> <p> <img class="aligncenter" src="https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ui=2&ik=bc3f134ea3&view=att&th=147c738735f746ac&attid=0.6&disp=emb&realattid=ii_hyqcavdy2_147c7125b21f0304&zw&atsh=1" alt="" width="342" height="456" /> </div> <p> <img class="aligncenter" src="https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ui=2&ik=bc3f134ea3&view=att&th=147c738735f746ac&attid=0.1&disp=emb&realattid=ii_hyqcav8a1_147c7125b21f0304&zw&atsh=1" alt="" width="342" height="456" /> </div> </div> <div class="gmail_default"> This was between meeting a group of Santosh&#8217;s friends for Philz coffee and a walk around the Infinite Loop and meeting more of his friends in Zenny, an Ethiopian restaurant in San Jose.

item.title: SVL 1.4: The Great Outdoors and Indoors
item.description: After I wrote to you the previous time, we went out and went to DeeDees, a Gujarati restaurant for dinner. Just near where we parked, I took these pictures.

item.title: SVL 1.3: Independence
item.description: 18th July 2014 Dear family and friends ðŸ™‚ How are you? Iâ€™ve been happy to hear from more of you recently. Life has taken on more of a normal rhythm now that itâ€™s been ~a month since I landed.

item.title: SVL 1.2: Two weeks in the USA
item.description: 2nd July 2014 Hello everyone, Today I took the driversâ€™ written test and passed with flying colours. I got all answers correct! I studied hard for the last couple of days although I was preparing using videos even sometime last week.

item.title: Sunnyvale Letters (SVL) 1: Wedding and After
item.description: June 21st 2014 Happy Summer Solstice everyone! ðŸ™‚ I woke up at 5am because of jetlag and my husband, Santosh, is still sleeping. Iâ€™ve been wanting to write every day of the last month but things have been so busy.

item.title: LOG 4.4: Defense on Monday
item.description: 11th April 2014 Hello, I submitted my thesis on the 7th of March and my defense is on 14th April, the coming Monday at 11am. I present my studies for half an hour and then face questions from the committee and audience for the next half an hour or so.

item.title: LOG 4.3: Another Publication and Plans
item.description: 13the February, 2014 Hello everyone, Iâ€™m happy to report my second paper was accepted for publication today. It will become available in another few weeks. Thesis work is progressing well overall.

item.title: LOG 4.2: The beginning of the End
item.description: 20th December 2013 Hello everyone, So, itâ€™s been a long silence. Three months and no word. How are you? As some of you may have seen on fb, my first first-author paper got accepteda few weeks ago and published this week.

item.title: LOG 4.1: Thoughts on a rainy afternoon
item.description: 14th September 2013 Hello everyone, I live close to the Uni so my daily space is very small. But recently I have visited my old flatmate Lea in Bremen once for dinner and once for their housewarming party.

item.title: LOG 3.7 Of rain and coming home
item.description: 19th June 2013 The sound, smell and sight of a storm are reassuring and comforting to me. I sit here thousands of miles away listening to Ghanana ghanana from Lagaan for a moment transported to Bangalore.

item.title: LOG 3.6: Five Months
item.description: 8th April 2013 Hi! Yes, itâ€™s been a long time. Nearly 5 months since I last wrote an update email. In November I went to Berlin for my UK visa, and spent whatever hours I was not at work or sleeping on writing a novel.

item.title: LOG 3.5: The extraction of Wisdom
item.description: 24th November, 2012 Hello everyone, Itâ€™s been a long time since I wrote and Iâ€™ve been meaning to but itâ€™s only on this foggy November day that Iâ€™ve decided to get to it.

item.title: LOG 3.4: Munich
item.description: Hello, Happy Pillayaar Chathurthi (festival for Ganesha- the elephant headed god) to you and your families ðŸ™‚ I just got back from lunch with my Indian friends.

item.title: LOG 3.3: To love a guitar
item.description: 6th August, 2012 Hello! Hope you are doing well. I sang in the Vorspiel Abend (Performance evening) with my rapper friend, Sven. I was nervous but it went well.

item.title: LOG 3.2: Music in the Air
item.description: 14th July, 2012 Hello everyone! Every Friday since I last wrote to you I have been going to 22 Otto Suhr Strasse for making music with the band.

item.title: LOG 3.1: Summer Solstice
item.description: 21st June, 2012 Happy Summer Solstice everyone ðŸ™‚ It has been two weeks since I got back to Germany from India. All the trees grew back their leaves in the month I was gone so everything looks and feels alive!

item.title: LOG 2.8: Data Collection (coming home info)
item.description: 14th March, 2012 Hello everyone, ItÂ´s been a month since I last wrote. ItÂ´s been filled with data collection. So what do we do in data collection?

item.title: LOG 2.7: Acapella Abend
item.description: 13th February, 2012 Hello, Europe is getting hit by a cold wave. Last two weeks were pretty severe in places like Ukraine, Poland etc. Oldenburg sunk below 0C and only today it has risen above to a measley 3.

item.title: LOG 2.6: Solistice
item.description: 23rd December, 2011 Hello ðŸ™‚ It is Winter here but there has been only scanty snowfall which secretly fell in the night and looked like frosty icing in the morning, quickly melting away.

item.title: LOG 2.5: Smooth
item.description: 28th November 2011 Hi! How are you all ðŸ™‚ Life cruises smoothly by. A bit too fast; weeks whizz by at an incredible pace. Work is moving smoothly, social life is fun and uncomplicated ðŸ™‚

item.title: LOG 2.4: Time of my life :)
item.description: Hello everyone, It has been an unreasonable amount of time since I last wrote. More than a month! And so many things can happen in a month.

item.title: LOG 2.3: Kramermarkt
item.description: 9th October, 2011 Hello all! It is cold and rainy here as I write. Just last week, I could wear a dress, and yesterday I had to pull out a heavy jacket to go out!

item.title: LOG 2.2: Photos of the Neighbourhood
item.description: 25th September 2011 Hello! Here are some photos of the neighbourhood. We went for a walk today after Marenâ€™s Birthday-cake party. Maren is my flatmateâ€™s girlfriend.

item.title: LOG 2.1: Autumn
item.description: 22nd September 2011 This morning on the radio, I heard a weather report unlike any other. The lady was shouting in German with even some â€˜bad wordsâ€™ which I could recognise about the summer which had more than its share of rain and how horrible it was that the bad weather was continuing into Autumn.

item.title: LOG 1.24: Coming home :)
item.description: 5th August, 2011 This time next week, I will be home. I canâ€™t tell you how excited I am! When I was translating a song which talked about Idlys in one line, /2011/07/29/balailakka-balailakka-lyrics-and-translation-with-end-notes/I looked them up to share an image link for those readers who donâ€™t know what it is.

item.title: LOG 1.23: End of Semester
item.description: 22nd July, 2011 Hello everyone, Yesterday I wrote the last exam of this Semester! Not sure when I will get results but IÂ´m sure what I did try, I got right.

item.title: LOG 1.21: Musik und Ordnung
item.description: 29th June, 2011 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I just scored 93% on my first level German exam! Feeling great about it! I have found order (ordunung) in my life and everything is organised in lists and inserted in my Google calendar and on my Napkin-mousepad ðŸ™‚ the furniture in my room is rearranged and everything is clean and tidy.

item.title: LOG 1.22 Boats :)
item.description: 12th July, 2011 Hello, I hope all of you have been well. Life has improved significantly for me since I organised it. I now feel like I have a sense of purpose and

item.title: LOG 1.20: Chickens and Seals
item.description: 13th June, 2011 Hello everyone, Itâ€™s been half a year since I left home the second time and luckily I will be back home for some time without as much gap as last time.

item.title: LOG 1.19: Sunsets
item.description: 2nd June, 2011 Hello, This will be a short one. MATLAB week is going surprisingly well and Iâ€™m learning a lot without getting frustrated. Only tomorrow left and I find that it has been an easier one than most others.

item.title: LOG 1.18: A friend visits
item.description: 31st May, 2011 Hello, Hope this finds all of you in good health and happiness. Today I had the first day of a MATLAB workshop which will last all week except Thursday which is a holiday for us.

item.title: LOG 1.17: Oh wow, Barcelona!
item.description: 11th May, 2011 Ola everyone ðŸ™‚ I have successfully recovered to a state of normalcy after the most amazing and exhausting weekend I can ever remember having!

item.title: LOG 1.16: Barcelona on my mind
item.description: 5th May, 2011 Hello, Tonight I sleep in Bremen Airport to be on time for a very early morning flight to Barcelona where I will meet two of my close friends from my year in Edinburgh â€¦ it will be one of their birthdays during the weekend when we will be there and we will be staying with the kind hospitality of the otherâ€™s brother.

item.title: LOG 1.15: Rise and Fall
item.description: 22nd April, 2011 Jananiâ€™s log; Solar date: 220411.12 Last week I had crammed too many activities into my schedule; attending multiple classes, working on the programming, in aerobics, music group and a Greenpeace meeting.

item.title: LOG 1.14: A Trip to GÃ¶ttingen
item.description: 10th April, 2011 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I just returned from a trip to GÃ¶ttingen where my flatmates and I celebrated an old flatmateâ€™s birthday. We took a train yesterday morning and I was quite taken in by the beauty of the countryside.

item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60Â´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! IÂ´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: LOG 1.12: DMT, The Discovery of Dro"gen Hasen Weg and the Super Extreme Moon
item.description: 18th March, 2011 Hello everyone, I watched this video recently. http://www.esoterictube.com/dmt-the-spirit-molecule.htmlIt corresponds with what Joseph Campbell says about the spiritual world (as represented by myths and anecdotes from those who meditate, and shamans), drugs and psychological diseases like schizophrenia.

item.title: LOG 1.11: Light jackets and Programing
item.description: 13th March, 2011 Hi Everyone ðŸ™‚ We are halfway through March and temperatures are now ranging between 7-13! Quite warm (relatively) and it is now ok to venture out with either a light jacket with a heavy-ish sweater or with only one heavy jacket on.

item.title: LOG 1.10: The first signs
item.description: 28th February, 2011 Hello, It is now possible to see the first signs of Spring. The trees are bearing buds that will leaf and flower forth.

item.title: LOG 1.9: Aerobics, Music, Star Trek
item.description: 17th February, 2011 Hello everyone, I just came back from an hour of the most exhausting exercise in probably Years! I never realised how out-of-shape I have been until I saw 60 odd other people able to jump around during what they call â€˜Power Gymâ€™ for an hour while I was out of breath within 15 minutes.

item.title: LOG 1.8: Missing English and The Tree of Gondor
item.description: 11th February, 2011 Hello all, I got a mobile and landline connection. From my home number I can call landlines all over europe for free! So if you are in Europe, let me know your number and we can have a little phone chat ðŸ™‚

item.title: LOG 1.7: The new place
item.description: 2nd February, 2011 Hello ðŸ™‚ IÂ´ve moved into the new place. My things are finally out of the bags and in well organised shelves! So happy to have things out and well in reach.

item.title: LOG 1.6: Speaking German
item.description: 25th January, 2011 Hallo everyone ðŸ™‚ Hope you are all well and happy as you read this. Here is the latest news from me: The girl I live with got a new cat.

item.title: LOG 1.5: Snow, it turns to rain
item.description: 15th January, 2011 Hello everyone, It has been a while since I last wrote. Iâ€™ve been busy seeing houses, working (:O ! :)), and going out with friends.

item.title: LOG 1.4: Beauty and the Beasts
item.description: 30th December, 2010 Hello everyone, Another â€˜Old Yearâ€™ has gone by â€¦ well I hope it was as happy as it couldâ€™ve been for everyone. So many things have happened, so many new things have been learnt!

item.title: Letters from Oldenburg, Germany (LOG) 1.3: Holiday seasonâ€¦'A Freeze is coming'
item.description: 22nd December, 2010 Happy Winter Solstice to everyone ðŸ™‚ Most of Europe is experiencing an intense winter with temperatures hardly ever peeking above 0*C. The roads are icy and footpaths in front of those away on holidays are slippery.

item.title: Letters from Oldenburg, Germany 1.2: A Good Week
item.description: 12th December, 2010 Hi Everyone ðŸ™‚ Itâ€™s been a strangely wonderful week ðŸ™‚ Things happen here the way they are supposed to. Traffic lanes, bike paths, pedestrian paths.

item.title: Letters from Oldenburg, Germany 1.1: And so it Begins!
item.description: 6th December, 2010 Hello All!! Winter is a strange season to start a new thing anywhere. Mainly because places seem most uninhabitable in this season. But here I am, sitting in mz new office, struggling with ?

item.title: Goodbye Edinburgh, Hello Oldenburg
item.description: This is the beginning of a new series of letters I have sent home. It starts three months after my last letter from Edinburgh when I was about to leave for India.

item.title: LfE 27: Home
item.description: 22/08/2010 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I hope everything is going well with all of you. This is the final mail Iâ€™ll send from Edinburgh to all of you because my magical and memorable year has come to an end.

item.title: LfE 26: Amsterdam and realisation of love
item.description: 11/07/2010 Hello I write less and less often nowadays mainly because Iâ€™m more busy but also because theres more of the same type of things happening.

item.title: LfE 25: Swift time
item.description: 21/05/2010 Hello! Looks like it really has been a month since I last wrote! And what a busy month itâ€™s been! Various assignments, deadlines, work with project and otherwise, workshops on new software, just so muchâ€¦of everything has happened!

item.title: LfE 24: Volcano Sunset
item.description: 20/04/2010 Â Hello, As you all probably know, the Iceland Volcano continues to erupt disrupting flights all over northern Europe. My flatmate who was supposed to go to Germany for part of her PhD has been grounded here.

item.title: LfE 20: Dundee
item.description: 25/02/2010 I went to Dundee for a training session for the postgrad review job that I have. It snow-stormed in the morning. Wild winds. Train was good.

item.title: LfE 19: Work and Tea
item.description: 22/02/2010 Hello everyone, Itâ€™s been a long time since I last wrote, partly because Iâ€™ve not been doing too much of new things â€“ the project develops, and software glitches occur daily that I patiently overcome.

item.title: LfE 17: Brain Scan
item.description: 26/01/2010 Hello, It feels like a long time since I wrote. My project is now developing and I have a better clue about what it is about.

item.title: LfE 12: Weekend activities
item.description: 29/11/2009 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ Itâ€™s a Sunday. Four degrees celsius as I write, and cloudy. A bunch of us friends are going to the German market today on Princes Street.

item.title: LfE 11: Glasgow and Animal Handling
item.description: 18/11/2009 Hello everyone! This time I have more to say ðŸ™‚ I have a laptop now. Acer Aspireâ€¦metallic midnight blueâ€¦itâ€™s my first ever so Iâ€™m very attached, and loving to it.

item.title: LfE 10: Enormous Work Load and Frost
item.description: 09/11/20009 Hi! Itâ€™s me again ðŸ™‚ All is well with me and I hope you are all equally well. The pressure in Uni to get work done has suddenly risen exponentially and the weather is getting colder by the day.

item.title: LfE 9: Halloween and the True Colours of the Weather
item.description: 01/11/2009 Hello everyone! My cough is completely gone. It took its own time and I waited patiently ðŸ™‚ Last night was Halloween. We were out all night partying.

item.title: LfE 8: Gifford Lectures and Indian Festivities
item.description: 23/10/2009 Greetings! I recover from a cough as I write this. The reason for the long silence is the fever I had last weekend. I know you kind-hearted people are starting to worry already!

item.title: LfE 7: No news isâ€¦
item.description: 12/10/2009 Hello!! Itâ€™s been a while it seems since my last update. All is well on this side of the world. I am cocooned in academic life and donâ€™t hear the news very often.

item.title: LfE 6: Classes are Intense
item.description: 04/10/2009 Hello everyone! The weather this week albeit two days in the middle has been pleasant with sunny blue skies. This is most unexpected in Edinburgh but a joy to us although the wind can be a real bully while walking; pushing us forward and backward with no warning!

item.title: Letters from Edinburgh: 3
item.description: **19/09/2009 THE BEGINNING: PART 3** Hello all! It has been nearly 10 days since I got here. Freshersâ€™ week was very fun! I went for lots of cool events where we got to meet people from all sorts of fields from genomics to international politics and everything in between!

item.title: Dialogues III
item.description: Dear readers, Iâ€™ve finally started to shed my inertia and write properly again. Here is the next set of Dialogues we had. J: Just to clarify, was it the Old Testament which said the earth was flat?

item.title: Dialogues II
item.description: S: In response to your questions: What is relativism? Itâ€™s the philosophical position that all points of view are equally valid and that all truth is relative to the individual.

item.title: Dialogues I
item.description: I have a friend who I found last September after nearly 9 years of no contact. We initially had no idea that we would become close again.
